metadata.title: CVE-2024-12084 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - high
metadata.description:
[Heap Buffer Overflow in Checksum Parsing]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-12084` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rsync package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.3').
